attributes.action: Collaborate with other world powers to provide free, clean water globally.
attributes.additional_details: Although the UK has pledged to provide clean drinking water to 60 million people by 2015, and done its best to keep this promise, not enough is being done by governments around the world to end the water crisis in developing countries.
attributes.background:
650 million people live without safe water. Lack of access to clean water kills around 1,400 children a day. 
Just because we can't see it happening, doesn't mean it isn't. 
It's time to use the voices we have inside our mouse cursors.
